name: The Last Aster
description:
The Last Aster

Genre: Romance, Otome, Amare, Kinetic

Synopsis: As the war grows more serious, the people of Hyacinth begin preparing for a desperate new future. All able men above the age of 18 are being called to perform their duties and join the war effort. It is Cedar’s last weekend with his lover, Aster, before he too goes off to fight for his country. Follow the couple as they say their goodbyes in this heart wrenching love story that was made in one month for NaNoRenO 2023.  

Features

11k words

2 chapters, an epilogue, and unlockable letters

Full voice acting

CG art

... and more!

Meet the Team

Writer, Programmer, Project Lead: LegendEx Games

Sprite, CG, and Logo Artist: SummerOrigins

Letter Writer:  OonaTempest

Script Editor: HusbandoGoddess

Voice of Aster: Kiera Rhodes

Voice of Cedar: Luca Xavier

Voice of Mrs.Greene: Jett Barker 

Voice of Leon: Reese Bell 

*** Additional creative commons assets were used. Full credits can be found in the .txt file.
